parameter.name: vend.apiUrl
parameter.description: Base endpoint URL of Vend API.

parameter.name: vend.accessToken
parameter.description: Access Token to read and manipulate data of Vend account.

parameter.name: vend.fullProducts
parameter.description: Array of product objects.

parameter.name: vend.products
parameter.description: Array of products to include in the gift pack.

parameter.name: vend.customerId
parameter.description: ID of the customer who is entitled to the reward.

parameter.name: vend.paymentTypeId
parameter.description: ID payment type to be used for the gift pack.

parameter.name: vend.registerId
parameter.description: ID of the register in which the sale for the gift pack will be recorded.

parameter.name: vend.fromName
parameter.description: From name to be used for email and SMS.

parameter.name: vend.fromEmail
parameter.description: From email to be used for emails.

parameter.name: vend.salesSince
parameter.description: Since date to retrieve sales.

parameter.name: vend.salesAmount
parameter.description: Amount of the sales done by the customer.

parameter.name: vend.customerPosition
parameter.description: Position of the customer.

parameter.name: nexmo.apiUrl
parameter.description: The url to access the Nexmo API.

parameter.name: nexmo.apiKey
parameter.description: The apiKey of a valid Nexmo account.

parameter.name: nexmo.apiSecret
parameter.description: The apiSecret of a valid Nexmo account.

parameter.name: mandrill.apiKey
parameter.description: API Key to access data of Mandrill account.

parameter.name: mandrill.apiUrl
parameter.description: Base endpoint URL of Mandrill API.

parameter.name: beetrack.apiUrl
parameter.description: Base endpoint URL of Beetrack API.

parameter.name: beetrack.accessToken
parameter.description: Access Token to read and manipulate data of Beetrack account.

parameter.name: beetrack.vehicleId
parameter.description: ID of the vehicle using which the delivery would be made.

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('The customer has already been rewarded for the specified time period ', get-property('timeRange'), '.')

property.name: vend.saleNote
property.value: The sale was created with the products that are to be sent to the customer in a gift pack.

with-param.name: message
with-param.value: Gift pack has been successfully created but an error occured while creating a delivery route for it.

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Gift pack has been successfully created (position: ', get-property('vend.customerPosition'), ', sales: USD ', get-property('vend.salesAmount'), ') and arranged for delivery.')

property.name: nexmo.text
property.expression: fn:concat('Hi ', get-property('vend.customerFirstName'), ', Congratulations! You have won a gift pack for being one of our premium customers. Await a gift at your doorstep within the next 3 days...! Check your mail inbox for more information.')

property.name: message
property.value: Customer has been notified about the gift pack.

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Customer has been notified about the gift pack via email, but an error occured while sending SMS (', get-property('sendMessage.errorMessage'), ').')

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Customer has been notified about the gift pack via SMS, but an error occured while sending email (', get-property('mandrill.errorMessage'), ').')

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Unknown error occured while notifying the customer about the gift pack via email (', get-property('mandrill.errorMessage'), ') and SMS (', get-property('sendMessage.errorMessage'), ').')

with-param.name: message
with-param.value: No products have been specified to reward the customer.
